+ Stability improvements and minor bug fixes
+ Support iOS10

We are constantly improving our app and delivering these enhancements back to the App Store.
Every update is a boost to the app’s stability, speed, and security.
Your App Store reviews are very helpful to us. In case you think Reminder and Countdown is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to send a review.
We would greatly appreciate it. Thanks for using Reminder Pro!

NEW FEATURES
• Sorting by category (the button of the filter is located at the top of the main screen, select custom sorting to arrange events by holding and moving an event).
• Switching between the old UI and new UI (in the app settings).
• Reload notifications (in the app settings).
• Customization of the event screen to share (swipe left or right to select a screen and arrange custom boxes).
• Viewing a note to an event by tapping on the box with time countdowns.
• Minor bug fixes.

Your feedback is important to us.
Please contact us with any question by tweeting @pers_apps or at support@persapps.com.
Thanks for using Reminder Pro!

• Viewing a note to an event by tapping on the box with time countdowns.
• Minor bug fixes.

Your feedback is important to us.
Please contact us with any question by tweeting @pers_apps or at support@persapps.com.
Thanks for using Reminder Pro!

NEW FEATURES
• Sorting by category (the button of the filter is located at the top of the main screen, select custom sorting to arrange events by holding and moving an event).
• Switching between the old UI and new UI (in the app settings).
• Reload notifications (in the app settings).
• Customization of the event screen to share (swipe left or right to select a screen and arrange custom boxes).
• Viewing a note to an event by tapping on the box with time countdowns.
• Minor bug fixes.

Your feedback is important to us.
Please contact us with any question by tweeting @pers_apps or at support@persapps.com.
Thanks for using Reminder Pro!

▾ UPDATED FEATURES
• Full mode of switching between the old UI and the new UI ("i" - Style).
• Separate place for the notes in the event view (no limits for the length of note text).
• "Reload notifications" to eliminate doubled notifications; available for devices with iOS10).
• Adjusting annual events originating on February 29: Event repeat - Custom - Frequency: Yearly - Month: Feb - Month Days: Last.
• Option: Auto-size of long event names.
• Minor bug fixes.

Your feedback is helpful and important to us. Please contact us with any question by tweeting @pers_apps or at support@persapps.com. Thanks for using Reminder Pro!

Thank you for choosing Reminder Pro!

What's done in this version of the application:
● Modified widget sorting: now events are sorted by date.
● Support for iOS11.
● Performance improvement.

If you have any feedback or run into issue, please send along any feedback to support@persapps.com, and we’ll see what we can do.

Thank you for choosing Reminder Pro!

Thanks for choosing Reminder and Countdown Pro!

This release fixes minor bugs.

We've also include stability and performance improvements.

If you like Reminder and Countdown Pro and have a few seconds an updated review is always welcome.

With gratitude,
The Reminder & Countdown Team

We've been working hard to improve the app so you can count down all the events that matter to you.

In this version:
- Fixed a blank screen bug after the app launches
- Updated format of "Abbreviated - Units": Y M W D h m s

Support Email: support@persapps.com
Bug reports and feature ideas are always welcome!
Get in touch with us anytime at Twitter @pers_apps

Thanks for using Reminder & Countdown Pro!

This update contains multiple bug fixes and performance improvements.

In particular:

• Fixed: Showing the wrong number of days on the badge of the application icon.

• Added: The ability to duplicate the event that was added earlier.
Swipe left an entry to get "Cope" and "Delete" buttons.

• Added: New sections in the event list: Today, Tomorrow, Next 5 days. 

• Improved: Additional time settings for the "Add time" function.
When you set an additional time, and then you need to add another time, the pop-up window immediately shows the previously added time, but not default value.

Support: support@persapps.com
Bug reports and feature ideas are always welcome!
Get in touch with us anytime at Twitter @pers_apps

IMPROVED & MODIFIED
• When you run the app, it shows the entries of the previously selected category.

ADDED
• Support for the app's dark style.
• Search for the app records through iOS search.
• A feature to show entries in the widget according to a user-specified period.
• Information about the number of entries in the category list.
• An ability to show entries of selected categories.
• Support for the dark style of the widget.

FIXED
• An issue with "Happy Birthday" sound.
• Notification texts: "till" and "since".

Even though we have been testing and fixing, some tough bugs might have slipped through. If you happen to see one, let us know right away at support@persapps.com.
